main event: A satellite similar to Echo 1 was tracked on ground radar, initially observed on 3 Feb 1962.
interesting points: The object was tracked for approximately 17 minutes before disappearing,It was initially observed at a heading of 132 degrees,The UFO was confirmed on ground radar,Multiple military reports referenced this UFO sighting,The object was described as having a size and brightness similar to Echo 1.
witness description: military personnel from the Department of the Air Force
